pod is a mechanism by which a container can run in k8, it contains the steps also for running it,
cluster is required to run pods, it is the base through which pods can run

a group of pods are run in a cluster, which might be a unit of replication(pod)
or it might contain related/unrelated steps.

a cluster runs many pods under the umbrella namespaces.

a pod is a smallest executable in k8? it is just a wrapping around  the containers

a group of pods might be grouped under a node

container-> pods-> node->cluster
